short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture parts of a page or entire sites and save into your directory!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly save images from the web. Screenshot parts or entire websites easily and organize them in Upclip. Share and discover what's inspiring UI designers and teams around the world.


Upclip is the smartest way for designers and teams to collect, tag and organize inspiration and design patterns for your next project
